summary: The diff implements most of the requested requirements. REQ-1 (Friends List), REQ-2 (Friends Management), REQ-3 (Simulated Call Screen), REQ-4 (Simulated Chat/Messaging), and REQ-5 (visual theme) are all substantially implemented. The two required images are referenced in code but listed as omitted files due to limits, so they cannot be definitively flagged as missing. Overall implementation is comprehensive with minimal gaps.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile Setup Modal that prompts users to enter a display name on first login
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention a user profile creation or display name setup flow. This feature (ProfileSetupModal, saveCallerUserProfile, getCallerUserProfile) was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Search/filter functionality on the Friends Management page
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asks for add, remove, and view friends. A search/filter input on the management page was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Access control and authorization system (AccessControl, MixinAuthorization) integrated into the backend
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention role-based access control, admin tokens, or authorization mixins. These are scaffolded infrastructure additions beyond what was requested.
